title: I didn't get my extra bonus rp

embed.description: Extra Bonus RP does not apply to mobile payment methods, and because of the advance notice, there will be no refunds for RP purchases made prior to the announcement or the promotion. Extra Bonus RP applies to prepaid cards (the $25 card is worth 3750 RP) redeemed during the period.

body:
Dear Riot

i just bought 50$ of Riot Points and i didn't get the extra boost of 700RP. Could you please help me riot. I only got 7600 when i was suppose to get 7900.

$5.00 – 650 RP
$10.00 – 1460 RP (1300 + 80 standard bonus RP + 80 extra bonus RP)
$20.00 – 3000 RP (2600 + 200 standard bonus RP + 200 extra bonus RP)
$35.00 – 5450 RP (4550 + 450 standard bonus RP + 450 extra bonus RP)
$50.00 – 7900 RP (6500 + 700 standard bonus RP + 700 extra bonus RP)
$100.00 – 17000 RP (13000 + 2000 standard bonus RP + 2000 extra bonus RP)

replies.body:
Greetings.

Maybe this answers your question?

> The Bonus RP wasn't supposed to kick until later in the day. Sorry about the unclear messaging. Anyone who already purchased RP or redeemed a prepaid card between 00:00 AM and 12:30 PM on Jan 12th we will be receiving the bonus RP to their account within 24-48 hrs.


> Hey everyone, we made a mistake here and used the USD prices and times instead of the AUD/NZD ones. We're really sorry about this and have updated the prices below. Anyone that redeemed RP on January 12th before 12:30 PM AEDT will have their bonus RP credited properly in the next few days. The bonus RP period is now enabled.
Have you made a ticket about this yet? The boards can't really help with this sort of thing.
